constituent: flourish, schoolhouse, owl, crown, tree, wood
heisigStory: The botanical connotations of the word flourish (to bud and burst into bloom, much as a tree does) are part of the ideal of the schoolhouse as well.
koohiiStory1: The TREES FLOURISH in the CLASSROOM, a little too much perhaps, there´s no room for the students any more.
koohiiStory2: Students are like young trees. They tend to flourish in the schoolhouse.
kunYomi: さか.える、は.え、-ば.え、は.える、え
myStory: làm giàu thành công. cây đội mũ điện tử
readingExamples: 栄える (さか.える), 栄え (は.え), 栄える (は.える)
